/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with tall buildings, their facades painted in shades of beige and brown, reflecting the urban architecture of the city. Cars of various colors are parked along the street, adding a vibrant touch to the scene. The sky above is a hazy orange, suggesting either an early morning or late afternoon setting. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of being in the midst of the city's hustle and bustle.
